ComicInfo.Title: New Reader Halloween Treat!
ComicInfo.Summary: Retelling the first issue in the Hack/Slash series, this comic, as the title implies, is focused on new readers of the adventures of Cassie Hack and his partner Vlad. But hardcore fans might enjoy it as well, not only for the new cover, but for the Slasher diary. It's a way of remember all the adventures of this team against the vicious slashers but from Cassie's own point of view. And of course, the characters profiles is a great bonus, just like the slashers gallery.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-07 23:27:20. [CVDB140619]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Emily Stone, Sean K. Dove, Stefano Caselli, Emily Stone, Sean K. Dove, Stefano Caselli
ComicInfo.Inker: Sean K. Dove, Sean K. Dove
ComicInfo.Characters: Acid Angel, Ashley Guthrie, Bobby Brunswick, Cassie Hack, Chris Krank, Chucky, D1aboliq, Dr. Gross, Dr. White, Evil Ernie, Father Wrath, Georgia Peaches, Hibachi Devil, Laura Lochs, Lisa Elsten, Lloyd & Jimmy, Lunch Lady, Mortimer Strick, Pooch, Six Sixx, The Re-Animator, The Waking Man, Vlad, X-O
ComicInfo.Locations: California, Chicago, Georgia, New York City, Wisconsin
